it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game.Board

Class ActionSpace

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game.Board.ActionSpace

  • public class ActionSpace
extends java.lang.Object
    ActionSpace is a specific Box of the Game in which can be placed a FamilyMember. In the ActionSpace there are informations about:
    • regionID: Region id in which is present this ActionSpace.
    • actionSpaceID: ActionSpace specific id in its Region.
    • single: boolean attribute if it is a single ActionSpace in which it can be placed only one FamilyMember
    • actionValue: a number of the actionValue needed to place a FamilyMember on it.
    • bonus: a ResourceSet of bonus resources that a Player obtains when he places a FamilyMember on this ActionSpace.
    • blocked: a flag representing if tha action space is blocked or not

    ActionSpace's regionID and actionSpaceID are final and all the ActionSpace of the game are identified with its unique combination of regionID and actionSpaceID.

    Author:
    VaporUser
    See Also:
    FamilyMember, Player, Region, ResourceSet.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ActionSpace

        public ActionSpace(ResourceSet bonus,
                   int actionValue,
                   boolean single,
                   int regionID,
                   int actionSpaceID)
        builds an ActionSpace object with the specific parameters passed.

        An actionSpace that has to be used in the Game, must have actionSpaceID and regionID not null.

        Parameters:
        bonus - ResourceSet of the bonus of this ActionSpace
        actionValue - integer that a FamilyMember needs as actionValue to be placed on this ActionSpace
        single - boolean attribute that specifies if in this ActionSpace it can be placed only one FamilyMember
        regionID - integer that represents the RegionID in which is present this ActionSpace
        actionSpaceID - integer that represents the ActionSpaceID of this ActionSpace in its Region
        See Also:
        Region, ActionSpace, FamilyMember, ResourceSet

    • Method Detail

      • isSingleActionSpace

        public boolean isSingleActionSpace()
        returns this ActionSpace.single attribute.

        This method is helpful to check if on this ActionSpace it can be place only one FamilyMember If returns true, this is a single ActionSpace and only one FamilyMember is permitted. If returns false, this is a multiple ActionSpace and there is no limit of FamilyMember that can occupy this ActionSpace

        Returns:
        this ActionSpace single.
        See Also:
        Region, ActionSpace, FamilyMember.

      • getBonus

        public ResourceSet getBonus()
        returns this ActionSpace.bonus attribute.

        This method returns a ResourceSet of an instant bonus of the ActionSpace. This bonus is used to build an Effect to give this resources to the Player which owns the FamilyMember present on this ActionSpace.

        Returns:
        this ActionSpace bonus.
        See Also:
        ActionSpace, FamilyMember, ResourceSet, Player, Effect.

      • setBonus

        public void setBonus(ResourceSet bonus)

      • getRegionID

        public int getRegionID()
        returns this ActionSpace.regionID attribute.

        This method returns an integer which represents the number of the RegionId of this ActionSpace. All the ActionSpace of the game are identified with its unique combination of regionID and actionSpaceID.

        Returns:
        this ActionSpace regionID.
        See Also:
        ActionSpace, Region.

      • getActionSpaceID

        public int getActionSpaceID()
        returns this ActionSpace.actionSpaceID attribute.

        This method returns an integer which represents the index of this ActionSpace in the ArrayList of ActionSpace of a Region. All the ActionSpace of the game are identified with its unique combination of regionID and actionSpaceID.

        Returns:
        this ActionSpace actionSpaceID.
        See Also:
        ActionSpace, Region.

      • getActionValue

        public int getActionValue()
        returns this ActionSpace.actionValue attribute.

        This method returns an integer which represents the integer that a FamilyMember needs as actionValue to be placed on this ActionSpace To have a working Game this actionValue can't be null.

        Returns:
        this ActionSpace actionValue.
        See Also:
        ActionSpace, FamilyMember.

      • getPlayers

        public java.util.ArrayList<Player> getPlayers()
        returns an ArrayList of Players which have a FamilyMember on this ActionSpace

        This method is necessary for the ActioSpaces which has ActionSpace.single == false to get a Player instance.

        Returns:
        ArrayList Players which have a FamilyMember on this ActionSpace.
        See Also:
        ActionSpace, FamilyMember, Player.

      • addFamilyMember

        public void addFamilyMember(FamilyMember familyMember)
        Returns a boolean to check if It can be placed a FamilyMember on this ActionSpace.

        This method modifies the ArrayList occupants} of this ActionSpace. returns false if isBusy() == true.

        Parameters:
        familyMember - A FamilyMember that is trying to occupy this ActionSpace.
        See Also:
        ActionSpace, FamilyMember, Player.

      • removeFamilyMember

        public void removeFamilyMember(FamilyMember familyMember)
        Removes from occupants an FamilyMember which is not more an occupant.

        This method modifies the ArrayList occupants} of this ActionSpace.

        Parameters:
        familyMember - A FamilyMember that is not more an occupant of this ActionSpace.
        See Also:
        ActionSpace, FamilyMember.

      • isBusy

        public boolean isBusy()
        Returns a boolean to specify if on this ActionSpace it can't be placed a FamilyMember.

        This method returns false if isSingleActionSpace() == true and occupants.isEmpty() == true.

        Returns:
        boolean which represents the result of this check.
        See Also:
        ActionSpace.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        returns a String which can easily printed on the screen. It is helpful for debugging, testing and visualize all the attributes of this ActionSpace.

        The String is builded with this pattern:

          [actionSpaceID]*actionValue
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a String which has all the information of the ActionSpace.
        See Also:
        ActionSpace.

      • getOccupants

        public java.util.ArrayList<FamilyMember> getOccupants()
        get the occupants of the action space, as a List of the FamilyMember which are positionated on tt
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of FamilyMEmber

      • flushActionSpace

        public void flushActionSpace()
        free this actionSpace, removing all the family members on it

      • setBlock

        public void setBlock(boolean blockValue)
        specify if the action value is blocked or not. An action space can be blocked if the correct umber of players hasn't been achieved for activate that action space
        Parameters:
        blockValue - the value of the blocked flag

      • isBlocked

        public boolean isBlocked()
        allows to retrive the value of the blocked flag
        Returns:
        the value of blocked flag
